text: Vladimir Eduardo Loroña Aguilar (born 16 November 1998) is a Mexican footballer who plays as a defender for Tijuana. ==References== ==External links== *Vladimir Loroña at Official Liga MX Profile *Vladimir Loroña at Flashscore *Vladimir Loroña at Soccerway *Vladimir Loroña at MedioTiempo *Vladimir Loroña at Flashscore Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Mexican footballers Category:Club Puebla players Category:Club Tijuana footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Sonora Category:People from Caborca
title: Vladimir Loroña
